news_header: A Delta Air Lines flight from Minneapolis crashed while landing at Toronto Pearson International Airport, flipping upside down. All 80 passengers and crew survived, though 18 were injured.
news_original_title: 'I was just in a plane crash. Oh my God': Witnesses recount escape in Toronto
news_text: Passengers described the chaotic scene, with many helping each other escape the overturned aircraft. The cause of the crash is under investigation, and two runways will remain closed for several days.
